data.title: Transgender Community Member And Social Media Star Pooja Sharma Approached For Bigg Boss 15
data.meta_description: A list of celebrities who are likely to participate in Bigg Boss 15 has started to do rounds on the net.
data.text:
Though she hasn't confirmed if she is signing the show this season yet, we thought of telling you more about Pooja Sharma. Who is she, her journey and a lot more. Read on.

Pooja's Journey To Becoming A Social Media Star

Pooja Sharma's journey started from begging in Mumbai local trains. She used to dance gracefully in the ladies compartment of local trains and uploaded videos on social media platforms. Her dance videos went viral over the net and won millions of hearts.

If you follow her on social media, you know how beautiful she is. Her videos can really put a smile on your face. Even after having a tough journey initially, Pooja Sharma never gave up on her dreams. She continues to have faith in the almighty and leaves no chance to thank God for her life. She is currently living the life of her dreams, her popularity is growing each day.

When Pooja Sharma Danced With Ankita Lokhande

Pooja Sharma came into the limelight when she was invited to Ankita Lokhande's parent's wedding anniversary party. It was a small get-together at home with friends and family members in attendance.

As per some reports, Pooja Sharma might enter Bigg Boss 15 as a commoner, however, nothing has been confirmed yet.

According to a report by TimesNowNews, Bigg Boss makers have already approached a lot of stars for the next season including Rhea Chakraborty, Mohsin Khan, Surbhi Chandna, Disha Vakani, Neha Marda.
